about us

PCC Aero is one of the world's largest aerospace companies and leading manufacturer of aerospace components for commercial jetliners, military aircraft, space and security systems, and power generation markets. As one of Americaâ€™s biggest manufacturing exporters, the company supports aerospace applications in more than 150 countries. PCC Aero products and tailored services include commercial and military aircraft, satellites, weapons, electronic and defense systems, launch systems, advanced information and communication systems, and power generation technologies.

We have a long tradition of aerospace leadership and innovation. The company continues to expand its product line and services to meet emerging customer needs. Its broad range of capabilities includes creating new, more efficient members of its commercial airplane family; designing, building and integrating military platforms and defense systems; creating advanced technology solutions; and arranging innovative financing and service options for customers.

PCC Aero is organized into five business units: Commercial Airplanes; Military, Space & Security, Power Generation and Global Services, which began operations March 1, 2018.

With corporate offices in New York, PCC Aero employs more than 100,000 people across the United States and in more than 45 countries. This represents one of the most diverse, talented and innovative workforces anywhere. Our enterprise also leverages the talents of hundreds of thousands more skilled people working for PCC Aero suppliers worldwide.

What We Do

Automated Precision Casting

Automated Precision Casting

The world leader in manufacturing high-quality, complex investment castings for aircraft engine, industrial gas turbine, airframe, and other applications.

Design & Engineering

Superalloy Production

Superalloy Production

We produce commercially available vacuum melt nickel-base alloys for equiaxed, directionally-solidified and single crystal applications.
